// {{{ NX.util.Format.numberFormat

/**
 * @class NX.util.Format
 */

/**
 * @method numberFormat
 *
 * "write it"
 *
 * @param o {Object} xxx
 * @return {Object}
 */
module.exports = function(v) {
    return v.toString().replace(/([0-9]+?)(?=(?:[0-9]{3})+$)/g, '$1,');
};

// }}}

/*
 * Local variables:
 * tab-width: 4
 * c-basic-offset: 4
 * c-hanging-comment-ender-p: nil
 * End:
 */
